name: Xenimus
description:
This is a free online RPG that is NOT pay to win! There are micro transactions but they are not game breaking in a way that would require a player to buy anything to be competitive. That means this game can actually be played for free. You can play all areas of the game, kill all bosses, get all the gear, and play any race or class. This game plays from a top down or 3rd person view.

Fantasy style RPG with a persistent world. Multiple classes and races, 100s of items with 1000s of combinations. Quests, dungeons, secret places, add properties to your gear, mini bosses you can do on your own, and larger raid bosses.
